name: Do you dare to discover Hanoi with a newbie? :D
description:
Honestly, I don't have any experience in guiding. And, as I described, my English skill is not perfect.
However, are you curious about other aspects of life in Hanoi? Instead going to fixed places which you have heard about Hanoi like Sword Lake, West Lake, Old Quater,... there are many interesting spots as well as activities in our city. Which are attractive to Hanoi-ers, especially the young; Love Road, Shows by students of universities...for example.
By the way, if you have any question, I will answer, in my ability,in order to help you could understand more about our culture, not only what you have known through advertising.
